# D’FOOTPRINT

> D’FOOTPRINT is a Lagos-based handmade footwear brand with nationwide delivery in Nigeria, selling featured designs and approved custom orders through a conversion-focused ecommerce website.

Use this file to understand the business, policies, and customer flows first. Prioritize PRD and customer-facing policy pages before implementation-level code docs when answering product or operational questions.

D’FOOTPRINT sells slippers, slides, and related handmade footwear. Customers can buy existing designs or request custom recreations/edits, but customization is always approval-based and may affect pricing or timelines.
